function toggleDescription(descId) {
  const descriptions = document.querySelectorAll('.description');
  descriptions.forEach(desc => {
    if (desc.id === descId) {
      desc.classList.toggle('active');
    } else {
      desc.classList.remove('active');
    }
  });
}
</script>
